components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: Inbound call failures to subset of Twilio Dominican Republic Phone numbers

incident_updates.body: We continue to observe a subset of call failures to Twilio Dominican Republic phone numbers. We are currently working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to observe a subset of call failures to Twilio Dominican Republic phone numbers. We are currently working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to observe a subset of call failures to Twilio Dominican Republic phone numbers. We are currently working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are observing a subset of call failures to Twilio Dominican Republic  phone numbers. We are currently working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Issue with Setting up Phone Number Configuration to Assign to a SIP/BYOC Trunk

incident_updates.body: Our engineers have deployed the fix for the issue with setting up phone number configuration to assign to a SIP/BYOC Trunk. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our engineers have identified the issue with setting up phone number configuration to assign to a SIP/BYOC Trunk and are working to deploy a fix. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Phone number configuration to assign to a SIP/BYOC Trunk. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: SMS/MMS Delivery Delays and Voice Failures to T-Mobile Network in US

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in MMS/SMS delivery delays when sending messages and voice failures to T-Mobile Network in US. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Long Code, North America

incident_updates.body: We continue to investigate SMS/MMS delivery delays when sending messages to T-Mobile Network in US. We have additionally observed Voice failures to T-Mobile Network in US. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Receipt Delays to Ooredoo Network in Myanmar

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Ooredoo Network in Myanmar. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to experience SMS delivery receipt delays when sending messages to Ooredoo Network in Myanmar. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to experience SMS delivery receipt delays when sending messages to Ooredoo Network in Myanmar. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery receipt delays when sending messages to Ooredoo Network in Myanmar. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Indonesia SMS carrier maintenance - XL Axiata

incident_updates.body: The XL Axiata network in Indonesia is conducting an emergency maintenance from 16 February 2024 at 10:00 PST until 16 February 2024 at 11:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to XL Axiata Indonesia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Vodafone UK

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Vodafone UK is conducting a planned maintenance from 17 February 2024 at 14:45 PST until 17 February 2024 at 22:30 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Vodafone UK customers.

Impacted Products: Lookup Identity Match, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

The AT&T network in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 19 February 2024 21:00 PST until 20 February 2024 at 05:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from AT&T US handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in Philippines is conducting a planned maintenance from 20 February 2024 at 02:00 PST until 20 February 2024 at 02:30 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects or call failures from and to a subset of Philippines phone numbers.

The AT&T network in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 20 February 2024 19:00 PST until 21 February 2024 at 04:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from AT&T US handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US, Canada and Puerto Rico Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS and MMS carrier partner in US, Canada and Puerto Rico is conducting a planned maintenance from 20 February 2024 at 20:00 PST until 22 February 2024 at 03:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from US, Canada and Puerto Rico handsets via subset of Shortcodes and Longcodes.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US, Canada and Puerto Rico SMS and MMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our SMS and MMS carrier partner in US, Canada and Puerto Rico is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 20 February 2024 at 20:00 PST until 23 February 2024 at 04:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from US, Canada and Puerto Rico long codes.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

20 February 2024 at 20:00 PST until 21 February 2024 at 04:00 PST
21 February 2024 at 20:00 PST until 22 February 2024 at 04:00 PST
22 February 2024 at 20:00 PST until 23 February 2024 at 04:00 PST

scheduled_maintenances.name: Netherlands Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - KPN

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner KPN is conducting a planned maintenance from 09 March 2024 at 13:00 PST until 09 March 2024 at 17:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for KPN customers.

Impacted Products: Lookup Identity Match, Lookup SIM Swap, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.
